source: F1 ability library; code-per-ability in game/abilities.js

dv_force_choke.label: Force Choke: Choose a hostile figure in your line of sight. That figure suffers 2 Damage and 1 Strain.

dv_brutality.label: Brutality: Perform 2 attacks. Each attack must have a different target.

luke_saber_strike.label: Saber Strike: Perform a melee attack using 1 red and 1 yellow die. This attack gains Pierce 3.

cc:advance_warning.label: You and an adjacent friendly figure each gain 1 movement point

cc:against_the_odds.label: If opponent has â‰¥8 more VPs, up to 3 figures become Focused

Fool Me Once.label: Return opponent discard to box; draw 1 if SPY

Heart of Freedom.label: Discard 1 HARMFUL, recover 2 Damage, gain 2 MP
Discard 1 HARMFUL, recover 2 Damage, gain 2 MP

Apex Predator.label: Focus, Hidden, 2 Power Tokens, 2 MP (recovery on hostile defeat manual)

Price of Glory.label: Discard 1 HARMFUL, gain 2 MP (optional Power Tokens manual)

Worth Every Credit.label: Discard 1 HARMFUL, gain 2 MP (VP when next hostile defeated manual)

Rank and File.label: Gain 1 movement point (you; adjacent TROOPERS resolve manually)

Urgency.label: Gain movement points equal to Speed +2

Battle Scars.label: Gain 1 Power Token (or 2 if suffered 3+ Damage)

Hit and Run.label: Perform an attack; after it resolves gain 3 MP

Heavy Ordnance.label: +1 Hit (or +2 Hit and Pierce 2 vs object)

Bladestorm.label: +1 Surge; after attack, hostiles within 2 spaces suffer 1 Damage

Camouflage.label: Become Hidden when attack declared on you

Assassinate.label: +3 Hits (first CC this attack; no other CCs)

Size Advantage.label: Perform attack vs SMALL: +2 Hit, Weaken

Rally.label: Discard all HARMFUL conditions (Stun, Weaken, Bleed)

Glory of the Kill.label: If defender was defeated, recover 3 Damage

Repair.label: Adjacent friendly DROID or VEHICLE recovers 3 Damage

Smuggled Supplies.label: Choose one: Recover 2; +1 Evade when defending until EOR; or +1 Surge to attack until EOR

chooseOne.label: +1 Evade when defending until end of round
+1 Surge to attack results until end of round

Opportunistic.label: After a hostile figure suffers Damage: gain 3 movement points

Reactive Loyalties.label: After attack targeting you resolves: IMPERIAL — attacker suffers 3 Damage; SCUM — gain 3 VPs; REBEL — recover 3 Damage

Cavalry Charge.label: Until end of round: +1 Block when defending; +1 Hit when friendly TROOPER within 3 attacks (apply manually)

Foresee.label: Look at top 2 of opponent's deck, discard 1 (manual). If discarded cost ≤1, draw 1

Preservation Protocol.label: When you have suffered Damage equal to Health: instead of defeated, recover 1 Damage

Mandalorian Tactics.label: Choose one: Gain 4 MP or perform an attack without spending an action

chooseOne.label: Perform an attack without spending an action (resolve manually)

Disengage.label: When a hostile figure enters a space within 3 spaces of you: gain 3 movement points

Force Drain.label: One hostile within 2 spaces suffers 3 Damage (Stunned/Weakened and recover 3 if FORCE USER manual)

Final Stand.label: When friendly within 3 would be defeated: move 2, gain 1 Power Token, attack, then that figure defeated (rest manual)

Master Operative.label: Become Focused and +1 Surge when declaring Close Quarters

Primary Target.label: Become Focused and +1 Hit when attacking highest-cost hostile (target validation manual)

Tools for the Job.label: Add 1 attack die to the attack pool

Wild Attack.label: Add 1 red die to attack pool, 1 white die to defense pool

Wild Fire.label: Remove up to 2 dice from defense pool

One in a Million.label: Remove all defense dice (only when not your activation)

Brace Yourself.label: +2 Block to defense (when not attacker's activation)

Brace for Impact.label: Add 1 black die to defense pool

Stealth Tactics.label: Add 1 white die to defense pool

Knowledge and Defense.label: Add 1 black die to defense pool (passive manual)

Parry.label: +1 Block or +1 Evade when defending (default: +1 Block)

Spinning Kick.label: This attack gains Cleave 1 and Cleave 2

Cruel Strike.label: Perform attack; it gains Surge: Pierce 1, Weaken

Element of Surprise.label: Remove 1 die from defense pool (LOS: target had no LOS at start of activation; confirm manually)

Concentrated Fire.label: Add 1 red die to attack pool (you become Stunned — apply manually)

Inspiring Speech.label: Up to 2 friendly figures adjacent to you become Focused

Trandoshan Terror.label: Add 1 yellow die to attack pool (when declaring Indiscriminate Fire)

Regroup.label: Discard all HARMFUL conditions from adjacent friendly figures

Take Position.label: Until end of round, +1 Block when defending (push immunity manual)

Survival Instincts.label: Until end of round, +1 Block and +1 Evade when defending

Hour of Need.label: Recover Damage equal to current round number

Take Cover.label: Until end of round, +1 Block and -2 Accuracy when defending

Emergency Aid.label: Adjacent figure recovers 2 Damage (3 if GUARDIAN or LEADER)

Celebration.label: After unique hostile defeated: gain 4 VP

Wild Fury.label: Become Focused (multiple attacks and Stunned/Bleeding manually)

Espionage Mastery.label: Return one CC from discard to hand, then draw 1

Guild Programming.label: Become Focused before each Rapid Fire attack

Prepared for Battle.label: Gain 2 Power Tokens (adjacent LEADER part manual)

Forward March.label: You gain 1 MP (each friendly within 2 spaces manual)

Marked Territory.label: Gain 1 Power Token (exterior figure part manual)

Looking for a Fight.label: Gain 1 Power Token (move or push manual)

Force Surge.label: Gain 1 MP; one adjacent hostile suffers 2 Damage and 1 Strain

Veteran Instincts.label: Gain 2 Power Tokens (choose Hit/Surge and Block/Evade manually)

Lord of the Sith.label: Gain 2 MP (Force Choke or attack manual)

Retaliation.label: Choose one: Become Focused; Gain 2 Power Tokens; or Gain 2 MP

Self-Defense.label: When hostile enters adjacent: that figure suffers 1 Damage

Slippery Target.label: When hostile enters adjacent: gain MP equal to your Speed

Grisly Contest.label: Adjacent hostile suffers 2 Damage (you suffer 2 Strain manual)

Dirty Trick.label: When hostile enters adjacent: that figure suffers 3 Strain (or Stun manual)

Force Jump.label: Move up to 5 spaces (MOBILE during movement manual)

Counter Attack.label: After attack on you resolved: if adjacent to attacker, attacker suffers 2 Damage

Desperate Escape.label: At end of round: move up to 6 spaces

On the Lam.label: When attack declared on you: perform a move (gain MP = Speed)
